name: Quietaris
description:
Relax yourself while solving all 1000 levels of Quietaris.

Enjoy instant starts, zero loadings, seamless saves and fluid animations.

Enter portals and move around tiles with easy swipes.

Make all the tiles fall and move to the next level at your own pace.

An increasing difficulty level will keep you entertained and focused.

The Itch.io version is a demo with only 30 levels. Get the full game on the Google Play Store!
